segments.text: I notice the boy stretching for the cookie jar, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so focused on the cookies that he doesn’t even realize how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the girl waiting for him to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just standing there, like this is completely normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re both going to fall if they’re not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is going to make it even worse if they do slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how reckless they’re being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying that plate, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t break anything—or themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR
